We will start with the help of God today an important tour of four countries in Latin America .. is Mexico, Brazil, Chile and Argentina .. We ask God success and repayment
These countries sent a number of trade and investment delegations recently to the UAE to strengthen their presence in the Middle East markets .. Today we want to strengthen this relationship
We have investments in these countries. We have opened airlines. We have increased our trade with them. Today we want to link them with the Far East through the UAE

The world is full of opportunities in its four pillars .. It is a great arena for competition and achievement .. Successful nations are extending their hand to all to achieve the interests and good people
Today we begin an important mission to 4 Latin American countries: Mexico, Brazil, Chile and Argentine.
LaTely these countries sent business delegations to the UAE to enhance their presence in the ME markets & we want to strengthen ties with them
We have investments in these countries. We opened airline routes and increased trade exchange with them.
Today we aim to have their link to the farthest east. Successful nations open up on everyone for the interest and welfare of their people.
